transcript:
Executive: Ha sir, meri screen visible hai aapko?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai.
Dekhiye sir, ye category aati hai Danfoss pressure switches. To jaise ki ye aapke sare products hai jo mai aapko dikha raha hu. Inme se kaunsa product hai is wali category se related?
Customer: Aai nahi, aai nahi.
Executive: Niche firewall aa gaya dekho.
Customer: Firewall to maine add kar diya aapka. Ab aapko firewall ki sari byleads aayengi. Ab aap mujhe Danfoss wala bataiye.
Executive: Dikhaata hu, dikhaata hu.

Customer: Ye bas ye raha, ye raha, upar chala gaya. Ha ha ye.
Customer: Ye matlab sirf uh matlab item ek hi hai pressure switch hi hai par wo Danfoss likha hai na wo party ka naam hai, Lepho likha wo party ka naam hai.
Executive: Wo party ka naam hai. Asal mein aapka jo ye aapne na ek do byleads Danfoss pressure switches ki recently use kari thi, thik hai?
Customer: Ji aaya ha.
Executive: Iski wajah se na wo ek irrelevancy create hoti hai. Agar aap Danfoss pressure Lepho Lepho pressure switch aa raha hai dekho to Lepho. Hmm?
Customer: Lepho pressure switch aa raha hai. Option mein aa raha hai Lepho.
Executive: Lepho?
Customer: Lepho, L E L I double F O.
Executive: Lepho nahi hai sir.
Customer: Hmm to ye Danfoss to party ka naam ho gaya sir.
Executive: Agar Danfoss ki bylead aapke paas aaye to aapka product to bikega na sir?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Thik hai.

Executive: Aur last sir aapka product SS hose clamp.
Executive: Isme dealing hai sir aapki?
Customer: Isme hai par ye hamare hai na product hai clamp bahut sare category mein aate hai.
Executive: Achha bahut sari category mein aate hai.
Customer: Hamara category hai hose ka hi hai par isme kya hai hose ka matlab hose to jo agriculture mein use hota hai na usko bhi hose bolte hai. Fire mein use hota hai usko bhi hose bolte hai. To usme lead kya hai matlab typical jyada aa rahi hai.

Customer: Usme kya hai wo agriculture mein bahut variety mein use hota hai. Yaha pe to ek hi variety hai 25%.
Executive: Okay.

Executive: To iski bylead aapko chahiye ya nahi chahiye?
Customer: Iski thik hai aayegi to bhi chahiye nahi aayegi to koi problem nahi hai, issue nahi hai.
Executive: Actual mein ye irrelevancy agar aapke liye create kar raha hai.
Executive: To to kya kehte hai mai hata du warna rehne do. Aap bataiye jaise aapko sahi lage.
Customer: Hata do aisa hai to usko.
Executive: Hata du na?
Customer: Hmm ye bhi aapke end se hi hatega ek na mis match jyada ho raha hai hose mein bahut sare clamp ki requirement aa rahi hai. To irrelevant jyada aa rahi hai relevant se.
Executive: Aur ek cheez hai sir ye aapka fire sprinklers.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Iska hai sir apna koi product? Ha ha hai usme kya aa raha hai sir? Fire sprinkler mein jo agriculture mein bhi sprinkler use hota hai.
Customer: Uski lead jyada aa rahi hai.
Executive: Fire sprinkler ki jagah pe agriculture mein jo sprinkler use hota hai na. Hmm hmm. Dekho aapne tick mark fire sprinkler pe kiya par aa rahi hai niche wala sprinkler dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Dusra number wala. Uski lead aa rahi hai bas ye karo ha. Aur niche wala bhi aayega apne mein.
Executive: Niche wala bhi hai aapka?
Customer: Ha wo bhi apna hai. Ye nahi ye nahi. Ye jo abhi fire ye wala teesra number wala.
Executive: Teesra, chautha aur chautha. Ha ha ye.
Customer: Ye pehla wala kyu chala gaya fir? Pehla wala chala gaya sir.
Executive: Keval do hi rakh sakte hai sir. To fire hose something ha. Aur niche karo to aur. Aur niche karo.
Executive: Aur niche nahi hai sir yahi che saat category hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Do best wali laga di hai, thik hai?

Executive: Ab sir mai aapko ek cheez bata deta hu.
Executive: Jaise ki mai aapko ek cheez dikhata hu. Aapko meri screen puri tarah dikh rahi hai na sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Dekhiye rank ke aage A likha hua hai. A A A thik hai na? Ye wo product ye wo category hai aapki. Hello.
Customer: Wiper hai. Ha band kar de. Wiper hai. Wiper hai padi hui hai jo yaha kyak bathroom mein. Bathroom mein padi hui hai wiper. Ha bathroom mein kyak. Room mein pani aa gaya hai.
Customer: Room mein aa gaya pani?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ha aaji boliye sir.
Executive: Ha sir. To mai ye keh raha tha ki jaise ki aapko ye apni ranks dikh rahi hongi. Dikh rahi hai sir screen pe rank A A A. Iska sir hamare yaha ye hota hai ki inme se products ki hum aapke paas jyada se jyada inquiries aur calls bhej sakte hai. To aap sir mujhe char se paanch apni aisi category banaiye jinki aapko jyada se jyada chahiye. For example fire hose box RR ha hose pipe jisme aapka margin jyada hai.
Customer: Hydrant valve. Hydrant valve ki jyada se jyada chahiye hydrant valve.
Executive: Kaunsi wali? Hydrant valve. Hmm. Ha bas ye.
Executive: Mai note down kar leta hu apne paas.

Executive: Fire hydrant valve ho gaya aur sir?
Customer: Aur hose reel ki. Hose reel drum. Hmm. Hose reel sirf likhenge to bhi chalega. Hose reel drum mein sirf drum hi aata hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur achha jaise ye fire hose reels hai. Hmm bas fire hose reel ha. Aur bataye sir koi aur si? Aur fittings ka jo item rehta hai na fittings ka. Jaise ki ye hai na sir RR RR likho to dusra number RR dusra number dusra number.
Executive: RR hose pipe. Ha ha uska chahiye.
Executive: Thik hai mai apne end se sir settings karta hu. Inki aapke paas direct calls aur inquiries badhwata hu, thik hai? Hmm.
Executive: Baki maine aapko bataya sir kya kehte hai ki jo bhi humne settings wagera kari hai na ye effective ho jayegi ek se do din mein, thik hai? Hmm. Aur aapko apni taraf se khud improvement dikhega. Hmm hmm. Thik hai? Aapke paas mera personal number jo hai. Abhi ye setting mein ye setting mere ko karna hai to kaha se jana hai setting mein?
Executive: Aapke paas sir mera personal mobile number hai na 7088 wala? Aha. Aap us pe call kariye. Aapka ye wala kaam mai karke dunga. Ye cheeze aapke end se nahi ho sakti kyuki hume na products ke hume operations ki knowledge hai IndiaMART ke. To hum karenge apne end se. Aap bas mujhe ye batana ki Karan aapne jo last time kaam kiya tha uske baad mere ko improvement mila in products mein. Ab mujhe in products mein improvement chahiye, thik hai na? Thik hai thik hai. Ye is tarike se ho sakta hai. Mai apne end se karke dunga.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Aur retail lead aa rahi hai uska kya karenge?
Executive: Uska sir maine wo I am interested. A rahi hai 10 piece paanch piece ki to aa hi nahi rahi kabhi. Sir maine wo I am interested wala karwaya tha na abhi aapka past transaction mein le ja ke. Agar usme aapne dekha ho abhi jo hum byleads pe ja ke hum past wali leads dekhne gaye the na. Ha ha. Us pe maine jo aap se kaha tha I am interested pe click kariye jo byleads aapko apne liye sahi lage. Agar aapko dhyan ho usme koi bhi bylead 50000 aur 2 lakh se kam ki nahi thi.
Customer: Barobar. Thik hai na? Ab IndiaMART ko pata chal gaya ki aapke wholesale ki leads pe jyada dealing hai aur specific products ki kaunsi wali byleads aapko jyada chahiye. Thik hai na? To uska improvement ab aapko milega aur uski aapko byleads jyada se jyada aana ab aapke paas start hogi. Okay. Thik hai na? Baki agar abhi bhi fir bhi aapko koi problem rahe to aap mere wo 7088 wale number pe call karna. Mai fir se review karunga mai kya kar sakta hu aapke liye best. Warna mai bhi aapko call karunga. Thik hai na? Okay okay.
Executive: Ab to aapko koi problem nahi hai na?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai. To aap jab 96 pe call karte hai na to aapka hello par dusra ye hai ki mera jo message ja raha hai na wo customer ko direct likh ke nahi aata hai. Usme city Junagadh likh ke aa raha hai apne ko hai na Rajkot karna hai.
Executive: Aapko Rajkot karna hai? Ha. Dekho sir mai aapko batau. Ye is tarike se kaam karta hai sir jaise ki ye aapka Universal Engineers ka account hai, thik hai? Hmm. Aur mai aapka GST kholta hu. GST mein jo aapka pin code hai wo 362001 hai. Hmm. Maine search kiya. To sir ye Junagadh ka pin code hai. Ha wo to hai par hamara branch hai na mostly do jagah hai Junagadh bhi hai Rajkot bhi hai dono jagah pe. Dono jagah pe hai. Ha to kya hai Junagadh chota city ho ja raha hai Rajkot bada city hai to matlab Rajkot mein koi dikhayega Rajkot to usko trust jyada rahega Rajkot mein item mil raha hai Junagadh matlab Junagadh kafi dur ho ja raha hai aisa. To sir us case mein to sir maine aapko bataya tha na wo TrustSeal wali cheez aa jayegi. Ye jo MDC rehta hai isme to jaise aapka GST hai na. Nahi aise do city do office nahi dikha sakte apne? Nahi sir jo GST mein aapka address hai wo dikhega. Agar aapko Rajkot tak visibility achchi chahiye to us case mein fir aapko TrustSeal wali cheez pe aana padega. Hmm hmm. To wo maine aapko pehle bhi discuss kar wala kaam hai aapka. Nahi nahi koi laphde wali baat nahi hai. Mai clear karta hu. Mai apne end se baat karta hu ek baar fir mai aapko bata dunga abhi thodi der mein aapko update deta hu, thik hai na? Ji ji. Baki abhi koi fir problem nahi hai na sir? Nahi nahi. To mai aapka concern close kar sakta hu abhi? Hmm. Thik hai sir. Abhi jab call disconnect hoga na sir mera to aapki email pe ek mail aayega jisme aap se mere se related review manga jayega. To usme sir aap satisfied mark kar dena, thik hai na sir? Okay. Baki mai do din mein aapko review call leta hu. Koi improvement na hoga to dobara kaam karta hu mai aapke sath. Achha business dilwa ke dunga aapko. Thik hai na sir? Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add Lepho pressure switch category.

- Irrelevant leads for hose clamp.

- Leads for agriculture sprinklers instead of fire sprinklers.

- City name showing Junagadh instead of Rajkot.

- Retail leads are of low value.



Resolution:

- Agreed to remove Danfoss pressure switches byleads.

- Added fire hose reel and RR hose pipe.

- Executive will make changes to settings.

- Explained I am interested feature.

- Explained TrustSeal for Rajkot visibility.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- byleads, category, settings, trustseal, gst
